akn:content.akn:p: (a) Program The Secretary shall carry out a program to promote cooperation on energy issues with countries of the Western Hemisphere.
(b) Activities Under the program, the Secretary shall fund activities to work with countries of the Western Hemisphere to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Participation by institutions of higher education

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Participation by institutions of higher education To the extent practicable, the Secretary shall carry out the program under this section with the participation of institutions of higher education so as to take advantage of the acceptance of institutions of higher education by countries of the Western Hemisphere as sources of unbiased technical and policy expertise when assisting the Secretary in—
